these files are all legit, it's my own collection.  the only plugin you should need comes pre-loaded into many media players.  i personally use vlc player because it has the most options with the simplest interface.  just google vlc and download.  of course, make sure the file you are trying to open is 100% downloaded.  you don't need to download all 158GB, just set a few to "high" priority and you can download those single files and watch them.  make sure the "high" priority file ends with a .avi extension of course.
